comments.text:
after watching such cute video, hard to imagine that is what you got from 
it, hate? and apparently ingnorance, okay panda 101, in the wild giant 
panda is on endangered species list, there are about only 1600 giant pandas 
in the wild. Chinese try to learn and save giant panda from as early as 
60's, after decades hard work, they have attempted to continually increase 
their number, and sending them into the wild, the protection network 
already included 62 nature reserves, and a couple of forest farm, migration 
corridors. It also covers 57 per cent of giant panda habitat and 71 per 
cent of its population in the wild. And next time do some research, educate 
yourself, don't use such hateful words about things you don't even know. By 
the way you don't have zoos in your country?!
comments.author: Jacque Ma

comments.text:
Fcuk,什么也不懂就骂我？ 
你这个小王八蛋，中国有熊猫自然保护区，几百公里的范围全是熊猫的。还有一点熊猫在野外寿命15年，而在人类的照顾下可以活到30多岁以上，比如巴斯。 
30岁等于人类120岁。最重要的熊猫是中国的国宝，每个人的心里都是。

top_comment.text:
Basically, Yuanzai is imitating her mother's moves, nibbling on bamboo and 
trying to climb up the wood set like Yuanyuan. She's also very attentive to 
whatever her mother does (like that cute peeing part and the drinking water 
part). If they are indoors due to bad weather, Yuanzai will explore the 
indoor wood set on her own while Momma eats. She's getting rather deft at 
navigating her way up and down the indoor set. She's also curious to what 
the zookeepers are doing and likes to roam away to watch them but Yuanyuan 
will pull her back as she's scared of Yuanzai getting hurt. Both mother and 
daughter are so adorable! Thank you Taipei Zoo!﻿
top_comment.author: laurel mia

top_comment.text:
第一次看到熊貓的"解放" 十分壯觀, 難怪小圓仔非常好奇衝去觀瀑.  圓麻麻還是很小心守著小圓仔, 不能隨便亂跑, 一定在安全視線內, 
圓麻麻才會放心. 園方很貼心在室內架設棲架讓小圓仔練習攀爬, 地板是否要考慮柔軟度, 像小圓仔的美國小舅公-小禮物, 被白雲麻麻推下去好幾次, 
好險地板是軟土, 否則跌下去很痛, 像泰國某隻小貓熊, 有一次不小心被麻麻從高處推下, 哇哇大叫~.﻿
top_comment.author: iq911C

comments.text: +iq911C 其实当年泰山摔下来的时候，动物园电话马上被美国的熊猫控打爆了。
comments.author: denglinzhiniao

comments.text:
看了泰山被摔并一直哀號的視頻，心裏真是難受極了！想象一下如果是圓仔也象這樣被摔一下的話，那木柵動物園一定會慘遭.............。好在有前車之鑑，相信圓仔一定不會 
遭遇泰山那樣的不幸事件的。
comments.author: Lihang Wu

comments.text: 相信園方一定會注意圓圓及圓仔寶貝上下棲架的安全及地板柔軟度還有硬體擺設的牢固安全.
comments.author: Juju Wwaann

comments.text: +iq911C 不客氣，那一摔可謂驚心動魄，泰山一路叫得好慘，好捨不得。也給其他動物園上了一課，室內擺設要注意安全。
comments.author: Lydia Teng

comments.text:
+Lydia Teng 謝謝大大的指正, 老花眼了, 把 "Tai" 看成 泰國, 在此對泰國貓熊控 say: sorry! 泰國 
zoo對熊貓的照顧非常有一套. 有關 Tai 重摔記 可從 "Tai takes a real hard fall " 影片觀看後印象很深刻, 
對硬體安全需要多考量.

comments.text: ㄟ....那是美國華盛頓動物園的泰山...要在泰國還得了, 動物園會被熊貓控給拆了...
comments.author: Lydia Teng

top_comment.text:
保育員果果們，室內棲架是用飄流木搭建的嗎？
為了不太過於寵溺小圓仔，為了小圓仔不受到無謂的攻擊，
用心手作每一階段適用、大大小小的玩具及設施；
我甚至可以想像，果果們開著小貨車到處收集漂流木的情景，
真的辛苦了，室內樓中樓跟室外觀景樓的都做的美觀大方，謝謝果果們！

硬體的工作由果果們包辦，細膩的工作當然是接接們囉，
每天幫我們把小圓仔梳理得乾乾淨淨、人見人愛，
小圓仔的毛量豐滿、毛色潔白就是最好的證明，
雖然我忌妒你們(噗~)，但是還是真心感謝細心善良的接接們！

(果果接接，今日我最狗腿，口以給我摸一下小圓仔嗎～～^O^)﻿

top_comment.text:
（週末比較嘮叨。。） 1. 
顯然保育員有在看留言哦。感謝再感謝室內的玩具，安排的還特別小心（比較密）省的阿肥掉下來。既然再看，這裡就提一個小小請求：好像好久沒看到圓仔笑了，最近表情都很嚴肅，是否可以’安排‘一下。。 
2。前天提到圓圓的智商。3：56時，她沒有左邊鐵門檔到去路的意識，還轉彎在後面等阿肥。看來我是高估了。﻿

captions.text: Itˇs getting colder
This weather makes people want to stay in bed all day
But giant pandas thrive in low temperatures!
At 148 days old
Yuan Zai is now good at playing by herself
She also begins to copy her mom, Yuan Yuan
On some days the pair sit with their backs against each other. One eats breakfast while the other one plays
(This looks tasty)
Yuan Zai imitates Yuan Yuan munching on bamboo
These days Yuan Zai wants to do everything her mom does
Unfortunately she can't climb up the wood structure yet
When Yuan Yuan drinks water out of the pond
Yuan Zai also runs over to join the fun
(Mommy, what are you doing?)
When Yuan Yuan is "busy" with other stuff...
No!
Yuan Zai, donˇt go near mommy!
Yuan Zai loves her mom so much that she needs to be right next to Yuan Yuan even when she's busy
On rainy days
Our keepers would have Yuan Yuan and Yuan Zai stay indoors
Mother panda enjoys her breakfast while Yuan Zai goes on adventures
Even though this piece of wood is pretty wide and flat
Yuan Zai still climbs up slowly and carefully
The curious Yuan Zai explores the top of the structure
(I am so high up)
(I better go down now)
Yuan Zai cautiously lowers her body with her butt hanging in the air
slowly slides down
Then she makes a perfect landing
Unlike previous tries, she does not roll down from the structure this time!
Our keepers are cleaning the room next door
Yuan Zai runs over to watch
Yuan Zai, your mom is coming!
Yuan Yuan doesnˇt want naughty Yuan Zai too far out of sight
and wants to bring Yuan Zai back to where she feels is safe
Yuan Yuan looks away for a split second
Yuan Zai makes her escape!
Yuan Yuan has to drag Yuan Zai all over again
(Mommy I donˇt want to go)

title: 圓仔學媽媽 Giant Panda Cub Yuan Zai Learning From Her Mother Yuan Yuan
